title: New: The Candescents – Back of Your Hand
body:
By the looks of **The Candescents** shows, they’re pretty into the house party scene.

Their snarling debut single, _Back of Your Hand_ is immensely memorable for what it is; 2 minutes of Arctic Monkeys and The Vines indebted garage rock, self described as ‘rock music that’ll drive yo momma nuts’. Judging a band on two minutes of music is pretty dangerous, but there’s definitely something rather exciting about the Columbus quartet.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a selection of the current hottest tracks.
